name: part_006
file: tmp_【重大告知アリ＆3D LIVE】秘密結社holoX4周年 3DLIVE【#SSholoX4周年】 [Z_E5w_pYAck]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Suki Deka / 〜Suki wa Deka-ku Kaikoroku〜'.

subtitles.original: 好きじゃない 好きじゃない ああ
subtitles.english: I don't love you, I don't love you, ah

subtitles.original: ラブのリポート 冷めやがぬ感情
subtitles.english: A report of love, feelings that won't cool down

subtitles.original: 馬鹿じゃないの 目を覚ましてね
subtitles.english: Aren't you a fool? Please wake up

subtitles.original: 全然平常心で 興味と過信だらけ
subtitles.english: With total composure, full of interest and overconfidence

subtitles.original: さらけ出して Want you
subtitles.english: Expose yourself, want you

subtitles.original: 自覚できなくて困る
subtitles.english: It's a problem I can't realize it

subtitles.original: たまたまに構ってあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you some attention once in a while

subtitles.original: 癖になっちまう絶妙な距離感
subtitles.english: This perfect distance is becoming a habit

subtitles.original: ゲーム 近く近付く
subtitles.english: The game gets closer and closer

subtitles.original: 一緒 デカく デカく デカく
subtitles.english: Together, big, big, big

subtitles.original: 何でも頂戴 サイズ出す 好き作りましょう
subtitles.english: Give me anything, show the size, let's make some love

subtitles.original: それがライクなのか ラブなのか
subtitles.english: Is that like or is that love?

subtitles.original: はたまた両方なんでば
subtitles.english: Or perhaps it's both?

subtitles.original: なし あり なし 絶対ありだろ
subtitles.english: No, yes, no, it's definitely yes!

subtitles.original: そして デカく デカく デカく
subtitles.english: And then, big, big, big

subtitles.original: いよいよ全部叶うからね
subtitles.english: Finally, everything will come true

subtitles.original: 結局 重い内と 重い内と
subtitles.english: In the end, while it's heavy, while it's heavy...

subtitles.original: 対処やっていきましょう
subtitles.english: Let's deal with it

subtitles.original: 一緒 デカく 好き デカく
subtitles.english: Together, big, love, big

subtitles.original: しばらくお付き合いよろしくな
subtitles.english: Look forward to our time together for a while

subtitles.original: スキデカ スキデカ
subtitles.english: Suki-deka, suki-deka

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: たくさんの感情 みんなに伝えて
subtitles.english: Tell everyone about all these emotions

subtitles.original: 俺だけに 見せてくれたっていいぜ いいぜ
subtitles.english: It's okay to show them only to me

subtitles.original: 一人と特別サービスはできません
subtitles.english: I can't give special service to just one person

subtitles.original: それでもいいかな
subtitles.english: Is that okay nonetheless?

subtitles.original: もっと知りたいことだらけ ほどほどにして
subtitles.english: So many things I want to know, keep it in moderation

subtitles.original: でも知らないほうが幸せか どっちかにしてよね
subtitles.english: But is ignorance bliss? Choose one or the other

subtitles.original: 絶妙な距離感 ゲームバランス取り合う
subtitles.english: Perfect distance, balancing the game with each other

subtitles.original: 一緒 付かず離れずは 辛いから ちょうど良く按配で
subtitles.english: Being neither too close nor too far is hard, so just the right balance

subtitles.original: お互いもっと解り合えたら 特別になれる
subtitles.english: If we can understand each other more, we can become special

subtitles.original: そうだ いつも通じ合える
subtitles.english: That's right, we can always communicate

subtitles.original: この先は想像できないけど 結構いい感じかも
subtitles.english: I can't imagine the future, but it might feel pretty good

subtitles.original: ギリギリでもいいから そのまま進みます
subtitles.english: Even if it's just barely, I'll keep going like this

subtitles.original: 踏み付けていきましょう
subtitles.english: Let's step forward

subtitles.original: ここで今後の我々について話し合っていきたい
subtitles.english: I want to discuss our future here

subtitles.original: 今は要らないでしょ！
subtitles.english: We don't need that now!

subtitles.original: いいからほら！
subtitles.english: Just do it!

subtitles.original: 3, 2, 1, Let's go!
subtitles.english: 3, 2, 1, Let's go!

subtitles.original: 一緒 すれ違う二人で
subtitles.english: Together, two people passing each other

subtitles.original: 一緒 デカく デカく デカく
subtitles.english: Together, big, big, big

subtitles.original: 何でも頂戴 サイズ出す 好き作りましょう
subtitles.english: Give me anything, show the size, let's make some love

subtitles.original: それがライクなのか ラブなのか
subtitles.english: Is that like or is that love?

subtitles.original: はたまた両方なんでば
subtitles.english: Or perhaps it's both?

subtitles.original: なし あり なし 絶対ありだろ
subtitles.english: No, yes, no, it's definitely yes!

subtitles.original: そして デカく デカく デカく
subtitles.english: And then, big, big, big

subtitles.original: デカく デカく いよいよ全部叶うからね
subtitles.english: Big, big, finally everything will come true

subtitles.original: 結局 重い内と 重い内と
subtitles.english: In the end, while it's heavy, while it's heavy...

subtitles.original: 対処やっていきましょう
subtitles.english: Let's deal with it

subtitles.original: 一緒 付かず離れず 呆れず
subtitles.english: Together, neither too close nor too far, without getting fed up

subtitles.original: ちょうど良く按配で
subtitles.english: Just the right balance

subtitles.original: お前ともっと くだらないことでも 笑っていたい
subtitles.english: I want to laugh with you more, even over trivial things

subtitles.original: 感情 付き合っていたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep sharing these emotions

subtitles.original: この先も 変わらない関係性を
subtitles.english: A relationship that won't change in the future

subtitles.original: ちょっと行き過ぎて またちょっと深呼吸
subtitles.english: Going a bit too far, then another deep breath

subtitles.original: 一先ず進みます
subtitles.english: For now, I'll keep going

subtitles.original: 好き
subtitles.english: Love

subtitles.original: さっさと戻ります
subtitles.english: I'll go back quickly

subtitles.original: なんでだよ！
subtitles.english: Why?!

subtitles.original: 好きは デカく 好き デカく
subtitles.english: Love is big, love is big

subtitles.original: しばらくお付き合いよろしくな
subtitles.english: Look forward to our time together for a while

subtitles.original: 不思議な関係 お見知りおきを
subtitles.english: Please take note of this mysterious relationship

subtitles.original: 超常現象 Phenomenon 東奔西走 Timeless
subtitles.english: Supernatural phenomenon, phenomenon, busying about everywhere, timeless

subtitles.english: The Red One

subtitles.english: Strongest

subtitles.english: Supernatural phenomenon, phenomenon, busying about everywhere, timeless

subtitles.english: Ba ba ba ba

subtitles.english: Passing through the night of the full moon

subtitles.original: ヴェールの隙間まで溜息を
subtitles.english: A sigh into the gap of the veil

subtitles.original: Wow...

subtitles.original: オレンジに染まっていく崩壊

subtitles.english: Burning with love, Veramera

subtitles.original: 守り抜くと誓ったあの日から
subtitles.english: From the day I vowed to protect you

subtitles.original: 明日のために ヴェラメーラ
subtitles.english: For tomorrow, Veramera

subtitles.original: 炎とに乗っちゃえば
subtitles.english: If you ride with the flames

subtitles.english: Boredom is endless, goodbye

subtitles.english: Ba ba ba ba

subtitles.original: 栄光が照らす 欲望の影を
subtitles.english: Glory shines on the shadows of desire
